Detailed Description

cvmx_stx::_int_sync

Notes: If the bit is enabled, then the coresponding exception condition is flagged to be fatal. In Spi4 mode, the exception condition will result in a loss of sync condition on the Spi4 interface and the datapath will send continuous traing sequences.

It is recommended that software set the OVRBST, DATOVR, NOSYNC, and FRMERR errors as synchronization events. Software is free to synchronize the bus on other conditions, but this is the minimum recommended set.
